content.question: Which of the following best explains how parties link citizens to the electoral process?

choices.label: Parties send volunteers to knock on doors to register voters.
Parties recruit candidates to run for election.
Parties research how best to frame issues in campaigns.
Parties determine the leadership of congressional committees.

content.answer: Parties send volunteers to knock on doors to register voters.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
